reviews.review_msg: AVOID!! i have never had such a horrible professor in my three years of university. the material is dry to begin with and he does not help that situation. extremely boring to listen to and just reads off his lecture notes. the exams are outrageously hard and do not focus on the major concepts. fill in the blank midterm and final.trust me, avoid him

You don't really have to attend his lectures as he mostly just talks about random things, but he will tell what will be on his exams so that's a plus. Exams are straight from the textbook and is pretty simple if you memorize everything. Lab portion is fun and easy as long as you know what you're doing. Great GPA booster course and intro to Kin

For kin 444. Seems like she knows her stuff, but if you listen carefully you'll hear her contradict herself. This is present in her PPT too. Goes through material rather casually and vaguely then gives you a vague test question and expects you to recite a text book. NOT WORTH THE AGGRAVATION.
